meanings.sent1: She always outpromises her friends with grand plans for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The politician outpromises his opponents with bold pledges for change.
meanings.sent3: The cat outpromises the dog that it will catch more mice this week.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm outpromises his ability to deliver on his commitments.
meanings.sent5: The sun outpromises the rain with its bright and warm presence.

meanings.sent1: The company outpromises its competitors by guaranteeing quick customer service.
meanings.sent2: The teacher outpromises the students that they will succeed if they work hard.
meanings.sent3: The child outpromises the parent that they will clean their room without any reminders.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outpromises any words of comfort during difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse outpromises the storm by guiding ships safely to shore.
